mapper.update: update PKG set CD_PKG_THEME = #{cdPkgTheme,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NM_PKG = #{nmPkg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AM_PRICE = #{amPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AM_SALE_PRICE = #{amSalePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CD_COMPANY = #{cdCompany,jdbcType=INTEGER}, YN_PUBLISH = #{ynPublish,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DT_REG = #{dtReg,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DS_NOTICE = #{dsNotice,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID_PKG = #{idPkg,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID_PKG, CD_PKG_THEME, NM_PKG, AM_PRICE, AM_SALE_PRICE, CD_COMPANY, YN_PUBLISH, DT_REG, DS_NOTICE from PKG where ID_PKG = #{idPkg,jdbcType=INTEGER} and YN_PUBLISH = 'Y'
select ID_PKG, CD_PKG_THEME, NM_PKG, AM_PRICE, AM_SALE_PRICE, CD_COMPANY, YN_PUBLISH, DT_REG, DS_NOTICE from PKG

select A.ID_PKG, A.CD_PKG_THEME, A.NM_PKG, A.AM_PRICE, A.AM_SALE_PRICE, A.CD_COMPANY, A.YN_PUBLISH, A.DT_REG, A.DS_NOTICE
from Apellian.PKG A, Apellian.CD_PKG_THEME B where A.ID_PKG = B.CD_PKG_THEME
and B.YN_PUBLISH = 'Y' and B.YN_DELETE = 'N' order by B.NO_ORDER asc limit 0,5
